value:
The steady rhythm of the waves
reminds me of my gentle brother's
comforting voice.

A world of everlasting summer
sun is no place for us denizens
of Dökkálfheimr...$k$pThough, I suppose I can allow us this
momentary joy. It will be over all too
soon as it is.

My álfar have come to the summery
seas as well, hm? How wonderful this
must be for them.

The summer sunlight glittering over
the water's surface brings visions of
my brother's smile to my mind...

I am dressed appropriately for the
occasion. I will abide no implication
to the contrary.

I am Freyja, Queen of Dökkálfheimr,
ally to $Nf.$k$pI come with tidings of summer.

How long has it been since I've
known the comfort of summer
sunlight, I wonder...

A fleeting summer's dream, vanishing
at the slightest touch...
Nightmares are meant for mortals...

If you wish it, let it be so. I will
cherish this memory and bask
in it as the summer sun.

I am Freyja, queen of the realm of
nightmares, Dökkálfheimr. A vision
of a summer dream called to me...

I do not recall seeing the golden
glisten of the evening sun over the
waves before now, and yet...$k$pI cannot escape the feeling that
it is familiar to me somehow.$k$pPerhaps I witnessed a similar scene
within a dream once, long ago...$k$pDreams are fragments of memories
and desires woven together, twisting
like a vision in a kaleidoscope...$k$pI must have, deep down, wished for
this day, the day I would visit this
place, these sands...$k$pThere was a time I... Well, I was not
always the lady of nightmare.$k$pBut for now, in this moment...let me
sink into a dream of summer love and
reflect on those days now long past.
はっ
せいっ
きゃああっ
何を…！？
Gasp for breath!
Avert your gaze!
Nightmare upon you.
Drift into darkness.
No...Brother...
giggle
You brought me to the beach alongside my dear brother... So, you can be sensible.
*gasp* You'd dare touch my bare skin?
So this is the sort of thing you drink in this world? ...I have no complaints.
My beloved álfar seem to be enjoying themselves. I'm glad.
I am no mortal. Do not look at me as if I were.
I hope to enjoy the sun and sea here with my brother. *sigh* It has been so long since we've had such time together...
I suppose I ought to spend time with you here as well, after you brought me along...
I will allow it.
I expect better.
Into the waves.
